tooltip.relics.blood_shield_ring.descrip: An ancient relic of Blood Magic. Passively protects the bearer with a blood shield, absorbing damage at the cost of LP.
tooltip.relics.blood_shield_ring.ability: Automatically absorbs incoming damage using LP. Only works when the ring is equipped in a slot.
tooltip.relics.blood_shield_ring.levelin: Gain 1 experience for every 10 damage absorbed.
tooltip.relics.blood_shield_ring.ability: When killing a creature, converts its maximum health into LP, multiplier depends on relic level and rarity.
tooltip.relics.blood_shield_ring.levelin: Gain 1 experience for every 400 LP gained from kills.
tooltip.relics.apostle_of_decay.descript: Once a bright artifact that was corrupted by otherworldly evil. The Cyclopean Eye's aura has been transformed into something greater..
Passively deals damage to all nearby enemies every second, dealing percentage damage based on their maximum health. Only works when the necklace is equipped in a slot.
tooltip.relics.apostle_of_decay.leveling: Gain 1 experience for every 2 damage dealt to enemies.
Enemies within range receive any healing at reduced value (regeneration, healing). Range depends on Aura of Decay level.
tooltip.relics.heart_of_tarrasque.descri: An ancient relic from the flesh of a monstrous beast, filling its bearer with inexhaustible vitality.
tooltip.relics.heart_of_tarrasque.abilit: Increases bearer's maximum health and provides constant regeneration based on maximum health. Only works when the relic is equipped in a slot.
tooltip.relics.heart_of_tarrasque.leveli: Gain 1 experience for every 40 health restored.
tooltip.relics.heart_of_tarrasque.abilit: The lower your health, the stronger any regeneration becomes. Increases all incoming regeneration based on missing health percentage.
tooltip.relics.heart_of_tarrasque.leveli: Gain 1 experience for every 80 health restored while below 50%% HP.
tooltip.relics.salted_shiv.description: A crudely forged blade, soaked in salt and blood. Each strike steals a portion of the opponent's life force and fighting spirit.
tooltip.relics.salted_shiv.ability.stat_: On hit, temporarily steals 0.5 hearts and 1 attack damage from the target, transferring them to the wielder. The effect lasts for a certain duration.
tooltip.relics.salted_shiv.leveling_sour: Gain 1 experience for each successful use of the steal ability.
tooltip.relics.salted_shiv.ability.speed: On hit, additionally steals a fixed amount of attack speed from the target for the duration of the steal.
tooltip.relics.salted_shiv.ability.shado: Shrouds you in dark smoke, hiding from enemies
tooltip.relics.blood_rapier.description: An elegant blade forged using blood magic rituals. The more life force accumulated in your magic network, the deadlier this weapon becomes.
tooltip.relics.blood_rapier.ability.bloo: Deals additional damage based on the amount of LP (Life Points) in your Blood Magic network. Adds damage for every 10,000 LP.
tooltip.relics.blood_rapier.leveling_sou: Gain 1 experience for each successful attack with active LP bonus.
tooltip.relics.moonlight.description: An ancient amulet radiating soft lunar glow. Absorbs incoming damage, protecting its bearer with invisible moonlight that grows stronger as the relic's power increases.
tooltip.relics.moonlight.ability.moonlig: Hidden effect that reduces all incoming damage. Protection strength scales with relic level and rarity.
tooltip.relics.war_helmet.description: An ancient helmet forged for the greatest warriors. Empowers the bearer in fair one-on-one combat and allows challenging bosses to a grand duel.
tooltip.relics.war_helmet.ability.duelis: In one-on-one combat (no other enemies within radius) gain attack speed bonus and damage reduction.
tooltip.relics.war_helmet.leveling_sourc: Gain 1 experience for each successful duel attack.
tooltip.relics.war_helmet.ability.grand_: Unlocks at level 10. Challenge a boss to a duel in a fiery arena. After activation, you have 5 seconds to strike the boss. Victory grants +1 permanent damage!
tooltip.relics.war_helmet.ability.immort: During Grand Duel, the wielder cannot die. When taking fatal damage, health is locked at 0.5 HP
tooltip.relics.demonic_crown.description: An ancient crown infused with infernal power. Burns the ground around its wearer and curses enemies.
tooltip.relics.demonic_crown.ability.sco: §6[Alt]§r - Activate fire aura. Deals damage to all enemies in radius every 0.5 seconds.
tooltip.relics.demonic_crown.leveling_so: Gain experience for damaging enemies with fire aura.
tooltip.relics.demonic_crown.ability.doo: §6[Alt]§r - Target an enemy and curse them. Target cannot regenerate health or use items. Deals damage every second.
tooltip.relics.demonic_crown.leveling_so: Gain experience for successfully casting Doom.
tooltip.relics.bloodgrimoire.description: An ancient tome written in blood of forgotten mages. Allows converting Life Points from Blood Magic network into mana for spells and empowers blood magic.
tooltip.relics.bloodgrimoire.ability.blo: Automatically converts LP from your Blood Magic network into mana for spells. Increases blood school spell damage. Only works when the grimoire is equipped in a slot.
tooltip.relics.bloodgrimoire.leveling_so: Gain 1 experience for every 50 mana restored from Life Points.
tooltip.relics.bloodgrimoire.ability.cri: Creates a zone of blood curse around the wielder. Enemies take damage based on max health every second and receive Wither II. Allies regenerate health. Only works when the grimoire is equipped in a slot.
tooltip.relics.bloodgrimoire.leveling_so: Gain 1 experience for each enemy hit by the ability every second.
tooltip.relics.seth_blade.description: A cursed khopesh that binds Seth. It cannot be discarded. It demands offerings and later chooses victims on its own.
tooltip.relics.seth_blade.ability.seths_: Passive. Before awakening, demands 5 offerings. After awakening, Seth marks a victim every 1-5 minutes. Killing the victim increases your power.
tooltip.relics.mana_flux_veil.descriptio: Ancient focus turning mana into protective stream absorbing damage instead of body.
tooltip.relics.mana_flux_veil.ability.ma: Alt – toggle shield. Absorbs raw damage for mana (1 dmg = 2 mana).
tooltip.relics.mana_flux_veil.leveling_s: Gain 1 XP for every 10 damage absorbed.
